entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain mixed with drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
